blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

requestBody.failureMessage: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.
data.failureMessage: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
